Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-11961 affecting package libpcap for versions less than 1.10.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-11961 affecting package libpcap for versions less than 1.10.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpcap is earlier than 1.10.6-1, affected by CVE-2025-11961
